mapper.select: update INSBCarowneinfo set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},personid = #{personid} where id = #{id}

SELECT b.name as carownername,c.carlicenseno,d.prvshotname,a.id as carownerid from insbcarowneinfo a, insbperson b, insbcarinfohis c, insbprovider d where a.taskid = #{taskid} and a.personid = b.id and a.taskid = c.taskid and c.inscomcode = #{inscomcode} and d.id = c.inscomcode
